PHRASE.LANG: Sometimes the best memories come from sitting by the fire with your friends. [#Legal]
Parfois les meilleurs souvenirs, c'est d'être simplement assis autour d'un feu avec vos amis: [#Legal]
Manchmal kommen die schönsten Erinnerungen davon, mit Freunden am Feuer zu sitzen. [#Legal]
A volte i ricordi più belli si creano proprio sedendo accanto al fuoco con gli amici. [#Legal]
A veces, los mejores recuerdos pertenecen a esos momentos que pasamos sentados con amigos junto a una fogata. [#Legal]
Sometimes the best memories come from sitting by the fire with your friends. [#Legal]
Sometimes the best memories come from sitting by the fire with your friends. [#Legal]
